author: ajaquith
msg: Bumped release number, changelog. Added release notes with some significant caveats to the current 3.0 builds. These caveats have been well-known to *me* for a while, but probably nobody else. :)

msg: Fixed bug in HandlerInfo that was preventing evaluation of permissions when <null> pages were set.
